content: I crafted a polished React frontend using Material UI, ensuring seamless user interfaces and an enhanced user experience. On the backend, I engineered an efficient Express server, optimizing performance and enabling real-time communication. I integrated Socket.IO to implement real-time chat features, enhancing user engagement. Additionally, I orchestrated GCP-based file uploads and downloads, complemented by MongoDB for streamlined data management.

I built and maintained essential components for seamless React web projects, focusing on user experience and responsive design. Collaborating with cross-functional teams, I crafted dynamic user interfaces with resizable components and styled them using shadcn/ui and Tailwind CSS. Additionally, I developed Express backend services for real-time data retrieval and updates.
